title: Malicious Go Modules Deliver Disk-Wiping Linux Malware in Advanced Supply Chain Attack
description: Cybersecurity researchers have discovered three malicious Go modules that include obfuscated code to fetch next-stage payloads that can irrevocably overwrite a Linux system's primary disk and render it unbootable.
